# windowDidUpdate(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the window received an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/update()] message.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowDidUpdate(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/didUpdateNotification]

## Discussion

You can retrieve the window object in question by sending [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] to `notification`.
title: windowDidUpdate(_:)
